name: Hand From Hell (Star_Dolphin_Studios)
description:
Jump and dash through 8 levels but beware monsters lurk in this strange place! Thank you for your support <3 :D

Join the discord for future projects: https://discord.gg/2e3VP6tQCq
Music from: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/

Thanks to @TheMHA for our logo!

Controls

Arrow keys or WASD to move

Use RMB or the E key to dash

Use the shift key to crouch

Check the controls tab in game for information on avoiding each monsters.
